\mathcal{L}_\text{VAM} &= \underbrace{-\frac{1}{4} \sum_{a} W^{a}_{\mu\nu} W^{a\mu\nu}}_{\text{Gauge field vorticity}} + \underbrace{\sum_{f} i \, m_f C_e r_c \, \bar{\psi}_f \gamma^\mu D_\mu \psi_f}_{\text{Fermion swirl propagation}} \\ &-
\hbar_{\text{VAM}} &= m_f C_e r_c \\ e^2 &= 8\pi m_e C_e^2 r_c \\ \Gamma &= \frac{h}{m} = 2\pi r_c C_e
\hbar_{\text{VAM}} = 2 m C_e a_0, \qquad E = m c^2, \qquad \Gamma = \frac{h}{m}.
h = 4\pi m_e C_e a_0 \quad \Rightarrow \quad \hbar = 2 m_e C_e a_0,
\alpha_g = \frac{2 F^{\text{max}}_{\text{\ae}} C_e t_p^2}{\frac{2 F^{\text{max}}_{\text{\ae}} r_c^2}{C_e}} = \frac{C_e^2 t_p^2}{r_c^2}.
